name: Rail Adventures - VR Tech Demo
description: The Rail Adventures VR Tech Demo is a free product, showcasing the upcoming action game Rail Adventures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7-4790K 4.00GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 980 4Gb Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-4790K 4.00GHz Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 980 4Gb Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible

reviews.review_text: Not sure why so many negative reviews, using the vive controllers to speed up or slow down no problem. Itâ€™s a rail cart trip through a snowy mountainous landscape, it was ok and free, it is what it is, certainly worth a look. Nice sound track as well.
ign 10/10 Rail Adventures is a big leap forward, and sets a new benchmark for rail games.
